title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text:
Design Laboratories Experiments: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9.
LABORATORY
Tension, Impact and Hardness experiments Calibration of proving rings Fatigue Tests and Endurance limit Shear and Bending of Beams experiments Photo-elastic experiments Strain Gauge experiments Abrasion of metals and non-metals Friction and wear tests in a Pin-on-Disc machine Study of Journal Bearing pressure profile.
Dynamics Laboratories Experiments: 1.Dynamic Vibration Absorber 2.Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes of a Cantilever Beam 3.Balancing of a Rigid Rotor 4.Effects of Feedback on a Cantilever Beam 5.Half Frequency Whirl and its Control in a Fluid-Film Bearing using a Squeeze Film Damper 6.Study of Two and Three DOF Vibrating System 7.Small Amplitude Oscillations of a Non-linear Spring
